about_the_game: A soundtrack comprised of most if not all of the songs inside Diari. Having over 75+ songs, you are sure to take an interest in the vast variety of styles and connecting leitmotifs that brings each composition to character. Ranging from fast to slow, ambient to upbeat, you're sure to find something of every category. The songs span from the whole game and represents a deep meaning to me (Zenovia) and my progression through my music journey. I value this close to my heart, and I hope you can find the same when listening to the soundtrack!

name: Diari Soundtrack
short_description: A large 70+, composite of all major songs in Diari! Travel along a journey with the music as they bring you through the whole story!
